properties.description: The Weavo Liquid Loom connector uses AI to auto-generate Liquid templates for seamless data conversion across formats like EDI (D96A, X12, EDIFACT, EANCOM) to JSON, XML, and Text. It also supports standard conversions between JSON, XML, CSV, and Text. Get your API key and AI-generated templates at weavo.dev.
